thread.section_title: Hotel Le Clos Notre Dame - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small but Great Location and Clean
thread.title_full: Small but Great Location and Clean - Review of Hotel Le Clos Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jstraveler01
title: Small but Great Location and Clean
text: We weren't sure what to expect from a Paris hotel but we were pleasantly surprised. Yes, the rooms are very small, smaller than NYC but I think that is to be expected at this price in Paris. The staff was very friendly and the location is great. It is very close to the station which goes straight to the airport but is also on a side street so away from the noise of the hustle and bustle. It was a short stay for us but would recommend if you don't plan to spend much time in the room.
